actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide employers a double deduction of certain employee training expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a special tax deduction for employee training expenses that are: (1) also deductible as an ordinary and necessary business expense; (2) incurred under the National Apprenticeship Act or under a recognized State program; and (3) at least one percent of the total yearly wages paid by the employer claiming a deduction.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide employers a double deduction of certain employee training expenses.
